section.title: PortGroup introduction
section.para: Port groups allow for efficient porting of open source software using the GNU objective-C runtime that defines options for the configuration, build, and destroot phases, and also defines some values for a specific software. A minimum Portfile using a PortGroup class needs to only define the fetch and the checksum phases.
